reviews.review: Just as good as the sequel.
This game is too much fun.

I had so much playing this game both together with a friend and with people online. This is a action/survival game where teamwork/co-op is the key. There are three main game modes and all of them are fun. Playing as a zombie reminds me of a similar game mode that Perfect Dark experimented with back in the day. This is a classic and still holds up, looks good, runs really well and there are still people playing this game. There's also some humor in this game which elevates it considering the theme of a zombie apocalypse. I'd recommend this to anyone who might be interested in FPS games and playing together or against friends.

its fun, even after like 15 years I still love to watch and play this game. Wish they would fix the darkness bug though.

This is all you do in this game:

Kill zombies, get to some sort of base and wait for someone to rescue you

Kill zombies, set off an alarm, get to the safe room.

Kill zombies, get to the safe room



It's boring, tedious and repetitive

Meu game favorito a alguns anos já, left4dead tem aquela pegada de ação e terror na medida certa ( atire a primeira pedra quem nunca tomou um susto com o hunter aparecendo do nada e gritando no seu headset )
recomendo sempre esse game pra quem gosta de jogos de ação, tiro, zumbis, terror e afins.
Apesar das atualizações do segundo game dessa franquia esse pra mim ainda é o predileto, o primeiro amor agente nunca esquece.

家里的10年一体机联想，经典的作品求生之路，让我在这个寒冷的东北冬季，也可以消磨时间，消磨忧愁。别人都以为我玩的很快乐，几张地图完了几十遍甚至几百遍，呵，快麻木了。可笑的是快麻木的不是游戏是我的人生。关掉电脑抻个懒腰休息“僵硬的身体”看着窗外雪白的世界，手机音乐播放器放着音乐，歌词里唱着 “看到窗外，飞过了野鸽’‘ “它笑着问 你的自由呢’‘。
如果，我是说如果。遇到我这样的男孩请你记得“分他一些快乐’‘。
我的人生麻木，我的身体僵硬，但我的灵魂滚烫如地狱中的烈焰可以焚烧一切。
2nd one is better because it has more content but this one is fun too. Would recommend. 7.5/10

"These Are My Friends Now"

This game, an absolute banger and a classic
i picked it up in 2019 sale, wit L4D2

I F--- love the atmosphere, Dark, Destroyed and Fu--ed Up.
You Run around your friends, making your way thru the City as you encounter L O A D S  O F  Z O M B I E S
who are fueled with R A G E and Adrenaline, basically like in 28 days later, and World War Z.
There's not only these raging fast zombies, there's also Special Infected.
Special infected include Boomers, who will try vomitting atcha, if they gotcha full of vomit, the Zombies will take ya as a target in big amounts, all of the nearby zombies who can see ya, Then There's The Hunter, an absolute masterpeace, he lurks around the dark corners of The City, fear him, he will jump on you and rip n tear ya guts out, you better not be alone around him. Then there's the Witch, a Girl with constant raging depression, sitting on the ground cryin, Dont Bother bothering her, she will rip your guts after running atcha, getting you down in no time, Then There's the T A N K, a big strong zombie who will smash everything in its path, he can pick up rocks and throw them at you, will run at you in high speed, will YEET YOU AWAY.
you better have a plan and a path when you encounter him

As you make ya way through the Yet-Not-Ruins of Pennysilvania you encounter these Raging Mad Zombies, You are in a Team of 4, Francis, a biker, Louis, probably an office worker, he also loves pain peelz, then there's this Girl called Zoey, she might be a teenager idk, just your average girl, no identified job from my experience, Then last but not least there's Bill, a Heroic Army Veteran.

There's a variety of guns, not too huge though, you can revive downed team members which provides more feelings of survival and teamwork, you can heal yourself with pain pills which will temp heal you, or First aid kits, which you can also use on yourself or your friend, it'll get your HP back, go Blow some heads up with the Shotgun in this absolute Masterpeace

IF YOU HAVE L4D2 OR ARE PLANNING TO BUY L4D2, BUY L4D2 INSTEAD, I TIHNK IT HAS l4D1 CAMPAIGN TOO, atleast when you own this banger, but i think l4d2 has l4d1 campaign regardless
